_header: Christ God me speed now in my little treatise
Subjects: alphabetic poems; Virgin Mary, hymns to
_description: John Marion’s ABC hymn to the Virgin Mary — twenty-two stanzas rhyme royal

BLAru168.First Lines:
Criste god me spede now in my lityll tretyseAnd gyfe me grace so
                    for to lerne…
BLAru168.Last Lines:
…That oure soules be saf & principally thenneWhan ye can
                    say no more but titill est Amen
BLAru168.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble. 
             “Lydgatiana.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         131 (1913): 40-63: 53-4.
